title: The Last of Us Season 2 Trailer Reactions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.10.25
description:
Check out Monster Hunter Now here! https://mhn-web.onelink.me/ZLW3/tswfcfq5 

Go to http://joinbilt.com/kindafunny to start earning points on your rent payments today.

Go to http://get.stash.com/KINDAFUNNY to see how you can receive $25 towards your 
first stock purchase and to view important disclosures.

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST where we live react to the Death Stranding 2 trailer and talk about ALL the Easter eggs!
 - The kinda funny podcast is after that, and it’s all about Greg going to Boston to film a movie over the weekend!
 - For the stream, the Nicklocke continues! AND don’t forget the 12-hour stream is on your youtube channel now!
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - Today’s Gregway is coming this afternoon and gonna be a doozy.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:52 - Housekeeping
              -  The Roper Report   -
00:08:03 - TLOU Season 2 Trailer Reaction
00:29:17 - Death Stranding 2 Gets a Release Date
00:35:05 - Xbox’s New Hardware Plans
00:51:26 - SuperChats
00:52:14 - Mar10 Day News
00:54:51 - Hell Yeah, Split Fiction
00:57:20 - WanderStop Review Round-Up
00:59:20 - Wee News!
01:04:19 - You‘re Wrong & SuperChats
